overview: Ma Daocheng, a poor but extremely hard-working actor, returned to his rental house to take a bath and go to bed after a tiring day. When he walked into the rental house, he found that a stubborn and unreasonable girl came to the house. The beautiful girl asked to live here in the future. What kind of story will happen to the two people under the same roof, and what motives does this girl have?
title: Female Tenant
